description: The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) Health Services require the services of a Speech Language Pathologist (SLP) for the Regional Treatment Center in the Ontario Region. The SLP must provide patient assessment, consultation, and referrals as needed. The target patient population will be geriatric, post-cerebrovascular accident, post-acquired brain injury, patients suffering from progressive neurological disease, and any others who may benefit from SLP consultation. The SLP must collaborate with the interdisciplinary health services team that includes, but is not limited to nursing, psychology, social work, occupational therapy and other allied healthcare professionals.

### Speech Language Pathology Services Request for Proposal

#### Contract Information

|

#### Tender Information
| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Procurement Category | SRV (Services) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Tender Status | Expired |
| Goods and Services (G&S) Mapping | G009G (Health and Welfare Services) |
| Unspsc Classification | None |
| Trade Agreements | None |

#### Tender Description
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Health Services requires the services of a Speech Language Pathologist (SLP) to provide patient assessment, consultation, and referrals for the Regional Treatment Center in the Ontario Region. The target patient population will be geriatric, post-cerebrovascular accident, post-acquired brain injury, patients suffering from progressive neurological disease, and others.

The SLP will collaborate with the interdisciplinary health services team that includes but is not limited to nursing, psychology, social work, occupational therapy and other allied healthcare professionals.

The selected services provider will demonstrate expertise in:

- patient assessment and consultation
- evidence-based practice
- effective communication and collaboration with interdisciplinary teams

#Prerequisites

- The contractor must obtain a security clearance at the preferred level through Public Services and Procurement Canada
- The contractor must comply with all applicable laws, rules and regulations

#Submission Requirements

- The bid includes a mandatory site visit at the designated location
- A detailed, written proposal responses which must be clear and precise
- Appendices listing skill resources, as well as proposed treatment interventions and their theoretical basis will be assessed
